What We Do

and you can too!

Skill Sharing

Share your favorite coding skills and tools with your friends and colleagues in friendly, no-pressure work-alongs.

Co-Working

Get together to work on your coding projects, help each other out and share your work.

Community Building

Meet new people in your field, organization or community - and find out what we can do when we work together.

Events

Our upcoming and recent events:

    • October
    • 22
    • 2015

    Using Jupyter

    Our next session will be on installing and using Jupyter. Led by Chris Holden this session will cover what Jupyter is, how to install it, and how to use it. Join us October 22, 2015 in STO 442 from 5:00-6:00.

    If you’re interested in coding in Python, R, Ruby, or any of the other 40 languages supported by Jupyter - you’ll want to attend this event. And beginners are welcome!
